pro2E.ui.SpecializedTextFields

Class EngineeringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • pro2E.ui.SpecializedTextFields.EngineeringUtil

  • public class EngineeringUtil
extends java.lang.Object
     The EngineeringUtil class contains methods to handle engineering
 notation.
    Author:
    Stephan Fahrni

      • convert

        public static java.lang.String convert(double val,
                                       int dp)
         Converts a double into an 'engineering notated'
 String.
        Parameters:
        val - The value to be converted
        dp - The number of decimal places

      • parse

        public static double parse(java.lang.String str)
         Parses an 'engineering notated' String for a
 double value.
        Parameters:
        str - The String to be parsed

      • parse

        public static double parse(java.lang.String str,
                           int dp)
                    throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
         Parses an 'engineering notated' String for a
 double value. Strings with more decimal places
 than dp are not allowed and throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        str - The String to be parsed
        dp - The number of decimal places
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException

      • parse

                    throws java.lang.NumberFormatException

 double value.
        Parameters:
        chars - The char[] to be parsed
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException
